body_text:
The Shield add-on will need to detect the presence of the Pioneer enrollment add-on. If it is found, we should set the enrollment preference (name TBD) and uninstall the add-on.
We can either do this on startup and register an add-on install watcher, or we can run the check once before every recipe run. I suspect the former has a better UX since the Pioneer tab will immediately show their enrollment.

body:
